operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO user_contacts (owner_user_id, contact_user_id, contact_phone, contact_first_name, contact_last_name, mutual, date2) VALUES (:owner_user_id, :contact_user_id, :contact_phone, :contact_first_name, :contact_last_name, :mutual, :date2)

operation.name: SelectUserContact
operation.sql: SELECT id, owner_user_id, contact_user_id, contact_phone, contact_first_name, contact_last_name, mutual, is_deleted FROM user_contacts WHERE owner_user_id = :owner_user_id AND contact_user_id = :contact_user_id

operation.name: SelectAllUserContacts
operation.sql: SELECT id, owner_user_id, contact_user_id, contact_phone, contact_first_name, contact_last_name, mutual, is_deleted FROM user_contacts WHERE owner_user_id=:owner_user_id

operation.name: SelectUserContacts
operation.sql: SELECT id, owner_user_id, contact_user_id, contact_phone, contact_first_name, contact_last_name, mutual, is_deleted FROM user_contacts WHERE owner_user_id=:owner_user_id AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY contact_user_id

operation.name: SelectBlockedList
operation.sql: SELECT contact_user_id FROM user_contacts WHERE owner_user_id=:owner_user_id AND is_blocked = 1 AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY id LIMIT :limit

operation.name: UpdateContactNameByID
operation.sql: UPDATE user_contacts SET contact_first_name = :contact_first_name, contact_last_name = :contact_last_name, is_deleted = 0 WHERE id = :id

operation.name: UpdateContactUserId
operation.sql: UPDATE user_contacts SET contact_user_id = :contact_user_id, mutual = :mutual WHERE contact_user_id = 0 AND owner_user_id = :owner_user_id AND contact_phone = :contact_phone

operation.name: UpdateMutual
operation.sql: UPDATE user_contacts SET mutual = :mutual WHERE contact_user_id <> 0 AND (owner_user_id = :owner_user_id AND contact_user_id = :contact_user_id)

operation.name: UpdateMutualByID
operation.sql: UPDATE user_contacts SET mutual = :mutual WHERE id = :id

operation.name: UpdateBlock
operation.sql: UPDATE user_contacts SET is_blocked = :is_blocked WHERE contact_user_id <> 0 AND (owner_user_id = :owner_user_id AND contact_user_id = :contact_user_id)

operation.name: DeleteContacts
operation.sql: UPDATE user_contacts SET is_deleted = 1, mutual = 0 WHERE contact_user_id <> 0 AND (owner_user_id = :owner_user_id AND contact_user_id in (:id_list))
